name: Queen's Curse
description:
Plot

This is an Adult Visual Novel. It is available for Windows, Linux and Mac.

The story is about a guy who has suffered nightmares since childhood. This story will reveal the reason behind his recurring nightmares and a secret from his past that will change his future forever. 

As the story progresses you will visit some of the ancient Fantasy Kingdoms where you will gain your powers back, fight your Arch-Enemy in both Past and Present and build relationships with a lot of Hot Women while you are at it.

Gameplay

Your choices will directly influence the relationship with other characters. There's a points based relationship system. If you keep neglecting a character then they may leave you and this will impact the type of ending you get.

Main Characters

Protagonist can be named. Some of the main characters in this VN are Karen(Aunt), Jennifer(Mother), Maya(Lover), Ashley(Maya's Daughter), Seline(Maya's Daughter).
